==================================

# Tender Notice

## Contract Reference

*Tender Reference:* WS4489022225-Doc4489105570
*Amendment Number:* 2
*Solicitation Number:* WS4489022225
*Tender Status:* Expired

## Details

*Opening Date:* 2024-05-09
*Closinng Date:* 2024-08-27T14:00:00
*No. of Amendment:* 2
*Tender Publication Date:* 2024-07-03
*Tender Description:*

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan), invites the interested firms to submit their proposals to supply an evolving test facility. The facility will be situated in Varennes, Quebec, Canada, and it includes different specifications. The Procurement category is Drilling and boring services which are *Laboratory laboratory equipment and related amenities.

Details of the procurement included:

- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)    
  
## Bidders

- Departments of Natural Resources
- Ministry of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Trade Agreements

*list Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement of Trade Partnerships, WTO GPA, CETA*

## Where to Contact

If you have any enquires, please check the Tender details on Ariba Portal at the following link
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19651439?extsite=MTk2NTE0MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
